value:
Look at this gift I got from Anthiese!
I'll treasure it until the end of time!

My mask isn't a good fit for a festival
about love, so I left it at home. There
won't be any enemies today, right?

Are you shy about giving gifts? Don't
worry. What matters isn't what you
give—what matters is it's from you.

Hey, the band's playing our song!
What?! Of course we have a song!
Come on, let's dance!

I bought this flute from a local trader.
Nice, right? Only...I don't know how
to play. Which holes are for what?

I'm honored to be the Day of
Devotion messenger for
$Nf. So exciting!
Yes! Presents!

I'm going to become so strong that
you'll think of me as completely
indispensable. Trust me!

You don't like your gift? Oh... Wait!
No, no, that one's for somebody else!
Ah, how did I mix those two up?!

Your gift means the world to me.
Thank you so much.

Hello there! My name is Conrad, and I
come bearing gifts. You'll do me the
honor of accepting them, won't you?

What are you doing standing
over here, $Nu?
All tuckered out?$k$pPersonally, I'm having too much fun
to sit still. The dancing spirit's really
got hold of me, I'm afraid.$k$pYou won't tell Anthiese, will you?
She tends to scold me for "going too
far" on the dance floor. Her words.$k$pIt's nice to step back and get the full
view of things. To see everyone, all at
once, having the time of their lives.$k$pBut you've caught your breath by
now, wouldn't you say? Come on!
I need a partner for this next dance!
えーいっ！
これ、あげる！
わわっ
やめてよ…！
Seize the day!
I got you a little something!
Dashing enough, Anthiese?
No more holding back!
Got...carried away...
えへへ…
Happy Day of Devotion! I'm excited to take part.
Sorry, this isn't for you. It's a gift for Anthiese!
I hope everyone enjoys the presents I got for them...
Anthiese has had a sweet tooth ever since we were kids.
Excellent outfit, isn't it? The hat's my favorite part.
I'm not used to picking out gifts for people. I hope I don't make a fool of myself...
I've got something for you. Just a little token of my appreciation, for being such a good friend.
What would you like?
I'd like that too.
I'm ready!
